name: Jing Kong
content: Nanomaterials and Electronics Group Nanomaterials and Electronics Group Prof. Jing Kong Sign In HomeNews Research People Publications Courses Contact Sign In We are designing new strategies to make graphene, MoS2, h-BN and other novel 2D materials with desired physical, chemical qualities. The in-depth understanding in how to make those materials is enabling us to develop brand new architectures for high-performance electronics and energy conversion.
